str2: And, even, also, namely.
The Sabbath, a week.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To begin. Middle voice of archo; to commence.
To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From sunago; an assemblage of persons; specially, a Jewish 'synagogue'; by analogy, a Christian church.
And, even, also, namely.
Much, many; often.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To strike with panic or shock; I amaze, astonish. From ek and plesso; to strike with astonishment.
From the base of posis with enclitic adverb of origin; from which or what place, state, source or cause.
This; he, she, it.
This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Wisdom, insight, skill (human or divine), intelligence. From sophos; wisdom.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
